#summary singularize(word)
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

*Description*:

Returns the singular form of the passed in word.

*Return Type*:

String

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *word* || string || true ||  || String to singularize. ||



*Examples*:

{{{
#singularize("languages")#
-> language


}}}
